des:
Havion security is the smart security solution that lets you watch over your doorstep. 

Before you get started, please make sure your Havion Security device is online. Then enable the Havion Security Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Havion Security Skill" and you will be directed to link your Havion account with your Alexa account.

With a Havion Doorbell camera, you can hear and speak to people in front of your camera from your FireTVs, Echo Show, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot). Simply say:
“Alexa, answer the front door.”
“Alexa, talk to the backyard.”

To view activity from your Havion Doorbell camera, say:
“Alexa, show the front door.”

To stop your feed, say:
“Alexa, hide the front door.”
“Alexa, stop.”

To see your most recent video clip from your camera, say:
“Alexa, show me the last activity from the front door.”
“Alexa, show the most recent event from the backyard.”
“Alexa, pause.”

When Havion Doorbell is pressed, live view automatically streams on Echo Show along with the Announcement. Toggle to enable Doorbell Announcement is auto enabled. Selecting specific Alexa devices for Doorbell, Motion & Person notifications is available. Multiple Alexa devices can now talk to one doorbell/camera at the same time.

If you Share your Havion devices with other users in the Havion app, they can use Alexa to see who’s at your home, too.
